Title: Do No Harm
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Karen Campbell (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, John Bell, Maria Doyle Kennedy
Plot: Claire and Jamie visit his Aunt Jocasta at her plantation, River Run. When tragedy strikes at the plantation, Jamie and Claire find themselves caught between what's right and the law of the land.
